title: Jonny Lieberman (What's Wrong w/ Acura?; RR Sport; RS4/5 Comp.)
description:
Jonny Lieberman (MotorTrend) tells us about his drives in the new Audi RS4/RS5 Competition; his trip to Goodwood Revival; why the new Range Rover Sport is better than its predecessors (and the regular RR); buying the Rivian instead of the Cybertruck; what's wrong with Acura; oligarchs; the new Guntherwerks Tornado; learning to write again; and a whole lot more. It's 2 hours of whiskey-powered conversation.

 

Recorded October 4, 2022
